desc: We carry reusable pads, panty liners, and incontinence products. Find the right pad for you and save.

layout.text:
Hello all! 
You can view our website to browse products, but will not be able to place an order. 
If you would like to be added to our waiting list for when I begin accepting orders again, please email me at naturallycozy@gmail.com or call/text at 208-217-0603. 
A note from Cana - 
Hello all, I’m very sorry for the poor and confusing condition our website has been in for the last few months. 
I am in the process of moving and finding a place to be able to operate Naturally Cozy effectively again, as well as pursuing an education in holistic medicine and biblical counseling. 
Thank you all for your patience and support through this season of change for the business and I. 
High quality, hand sewn hygiene products. We carry reusable pads, panty liners, incontinence products and more. Find the right product for you - save money and reduce waste today!
